Description: The law grants the interior minister authority to deport terrorists' family members if they knew of or failed to prevent the act. A five-year provision was also approved, allowing imprisonment for minors as young as 12 convicted of homicide in terrorist acts.

Title: Eighteen-year-old Israeli killed by rocket shrapnel in northern I...
Description: Sivan Sadeh's body was found in an agricultural field near the kibbutz after a rocket barrage from Lebanon. He had recently graduated high school and was preparing to enlist in the IDF. Sadeh is the 44th civilian killed by rocket fire from Lebanon since the war began
